title.narrative: HUMANITARIAN ASSISTANCE TO UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (UNOCHA)

description.narrative: This activity (HUMANITARIAN ASSISTANCE TO UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (UNOCHA)) is a component of Support to UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (UNOCHA) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £1,000,001. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Relief co-ordination and support services. , with the following implementing partners: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA). The start date is 01-01-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2013.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
